articles.content: Victorian Premier Dan Andrews has given the list of quarantine demands issued by Novak Djokovic absolutely nothing, lightly chiding the tennis star who is among those in full lockdown after arriving … [+2657 chars]

articles.title: ‘Total BS’: NFL underdogs crushed by ‘dumbest rule in sports’ - Fox Sports

articles.content: As if it wasnt already hard enough to beat the Super Bowl champion Kansas City Chiefs, Cleveland copped a tough call for two reasons in the first half of their 22-17 Divisional Round defeat that resu… [+1143 chars]
